TEXT.TITLE: GRAPHIC TECHNOLOGY <GRT> BEGINS STOCK REPURCHASE
TEXT.BODY: Graphic Technology Inc said its board has authorized the periodic repurchase of up to 100,000 shares of common stock. The company said the board believed that the stock has been undervalued in the market. Reuter
